data.title: Delicioso!!!
data.text:
Lucky to have an Italian bakery in my neighborhood. The pastry is excellent!!!!
Everything is fresh and the buttercream icing on the special order cakes.....yummm!!!

data.title: Yummy!!!
data.text: We always get our birthday cakes here for the family. The treats are fresh made and taste great. They will also make a custom cake if you bring them a photo. Really easy to work with staff for special events too. Oh and they did our wedding rehearsal cake and it was huge hit with all our guests.

data.title: Great cakes!
data.text:
Antonio's has such a great variety and selection of pastry, breads and cakes.  There is likely something to appeal to everyone!  I recently went to get a cake (ended up with two, because everything looked SO good) for a co-worker's going away party and all of my co-workers were thrilled with the cakes.  I really love the cake roll and at Christmas time, if you want something to impress, order a yule log cake.  It's a great combination of gorgeous and delicious!
Antonio's also has the deli with soups and sandwiches, meat pies are delicious.  I've never been disappointed with anything I've gotten there.

data.title: Great Bread and Pastries As Well As Charlie's Deli
data.text:
This is a great little bakery.  My wife and I love their breads and pastries.  The pastries are not overly sweet.
I've had an Italian grinder (Charlie's Special) at Charlie's Deli - very good!
His little meat pies are also excellent.
Friendly waitstaff.
Their cakes are very good,too.

data.title: Deliciously affordable.
data.text: I adore going to Antonio’s for all my desserts, fresh breads and quick pick up meals. They are very affordable and their pastries are absolutely delicious and reasonably priced. They are so prompt to serve you as soon as you walk in the door. They have fridges of pizza dough, homemade soups and sauces that you can take home. The deli is amazing, when I have time on the way to work, I quickly pop in and grab a calzone that I can heat up at work for under $5. That is a good deal. Sometimes a cupcake follows me to work too! 

data.title: Dough and a snack
data.text: All their stuff is delicious! Have never gotten anything we weren't happy or satisfied with. We buy fresh dough there as well as baked goods like bread, rolls, pastries, cakes etc.

data.title: Awesome bakery
data.text: Antonio's Bakery is a great bakery. I buy all my pastery rolls and pizza. There cakes are awesome.The staff there are great people.

data.title: Best Bakery within this part of Warwick
data.text: The pastries are delicious with hundreds to choose from, order birthday cakes. The place is very attracting and well kept. I highly recommend to anyone with a sweet tooth. They also have lots of home made fudge and the prices are very very competetive !

data.title: wonderful bakery
data.text: Our favorite place to buy pastry and Italian bread. Great selection. We have never had something there we didn't love. Nice when you are having a dinner party and want a special treat to serve guests.

data.title: PERFECT
data.text:
I got reccomended to this place  and could be happier. I never knew it existed because I live 10 minutes away by car. It is a spotless gorgeous bakery with the BEST
pastry I have ever seen. You want to buy it all. Really can not wait to get the freshest bread to the most beautiful treats. Spoile yourself  and go often. You will not be dissappointed !

data.title: Delicious Pastry
data.text: Carry a wide varierty of desserts, breads & calzones. Several cream cakes, lady finger cakes, cheesecakes. Excellent party trays of minii pastries both cream filled and danish.

data.title: Wonderful service and delicious pastries
data.text: The pies and pastries are A-1, and are reasonably priced.  The young ladies serving customers are pleasant and patient.  They take the time to prepare food items carefully, including coffee.  Make sure you eat your pastries slowly to savor them longer!

data.title: Wow bakery and sandwich shop
data.text: I completely overestimated how long it would take me to get to the airport so I had time to drive around and literally saw this gem as I was about to reach desperation mode.  There is ample parking in its strip mall location which is great because they have had a line 4 to 5 deep the entire time I have been in line. The locals know how to order...one counter seems to be for bkery good and the other for sandwiches. I went with the Itri Panini which is prosciutto, mozzarella, provolone, basil tomato, and olive oil. By basil, they mean an entire leaf. Everything was perfectly grilled on their own bread. Besides sandwiches, they also have calzones and pizza. They have the usual coffee shop selection of drinks. I went with a large iced Toasty Turtle flavored iced coffee....no flavors added. Delicious. In addition to 4 cases or prepared bakery/calzones items, they also have prepackaged cracker/biscuit things that come in flavors like wine and pepper. Think crispy bread sticks. Absolutely fantastic. Highly recommended for a great sandwich or bakery item

data.title: serves lunch also
data.text: can eat in for a quick bite , bakery is prime business , never got a bad meal, desserts are top notch.

data.title: A little expensive, but worth it!
data.text: We go every year after we run the 5K. Last week it was comfort food. The pastries are fresh and the selection is unbelievable.  The people serving get kind of messy but I guess that's expected when you're handling desserts.  I would recommend the cannoli and the pizza rounds!  Yummy!

data.title: WOW, UNBELIEVABLE CHOICES
data.text: Was recommended to buy Birthday cake and it was amazing. Little pricey, but you get what you pay for.

data.title: Chocolate Cake
data.text: I bought a Chocolate frosted Chocolate Cake for a chocoholic friend's birthday.  Excellent choice - super success.

data.title: Birthday cake
data.text:
I needed a Birthday cake and had not ordered it.  
I called Antonio"s  the day of the party and asked if they had an Italian lady finger cake. She said she would make it for me in time for the party. It was ready in a couple hours. Everyone loved it!
That was impressive service!

data.title: Average pastry
data.text: Have been many times, average pastry at a normal price. Nothing special. Good place to pick up a quick dessert when traveling to family for the holidays. Not something I'd suggest for a large gathering where you're trying to make a statement.

data.title: Popular bakery with all the carbohydrate varieties you might want
data.text: We arrived before holidays, took a number and got in line (we had thirty-five folks in front of us).  It's kind of a Warwick - happening.  Or, perhaps, a Rhode Island tradition?  Those near us assured us that "Antonio's was the best" (likely true), and that "the line would move fast" (not really so).  The deserts we eventually picked up (please, call ahead during high seasons) were excellent.  You might want to plan an exercise routine, or fasting, after downing the pastries from Antonio's sugar-laden delicacies.
